languages.text: {n}Воспоминания раздроблены на слишком мелкие фрагменты, которые ваш разум милосердно отказывается собирать в картины творимых вчера безобразий.{/n}
{n}Your memories have been split into tiny fragments that your mind mercifully refuses to reassemble into a clear picture of the scandalous events of last night.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Воспоминания раздроблены на слишком мелкие фрагменты, которые ваш разум милосердно отказывается собирать в картины творимых вчера безобразий.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your memories have been split into tiny fragments that your mind mercifully refuses to reassemble into a clear picture of the scandalous events of last night.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Your memories have been split into tiny fragments that your mind mercifully refuses to reassemble into a clear picture of the scandalous events of last night.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Your memories have been split into tiny fragments that your mind mercifully refuses to reassemble into a clear picture of the scandalous events of last night.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}你的记忆被分割成了无数细小的片段。你的意识大发慈悲，拒绝将你昨天晚上的丑态重新拼凑成完整、清晰的画面。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your memories have been split into tiny fragments that your mind mercifully refuses to reassemble into a clear picture of the scandalous events of last night.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的记忆被分割成了无数细小的片段。你的意识大发慈悲，拒绝将你昨天晚上的丑态重新拼凑成完整、清晰的画面。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたの記憶は小さな断片に分断されていた。昨夜の喧騒を鮮明な絵として再構成することを、その心が強く拒んでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your memories have been split into tiny fragments that your mind mercifully refuses to reassemble into a clear picture of the scandalous events of last night.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの記憶は小さな断片に分断されていた。昨夜の喧騒を鮮明な絵として再構成することを、その心が強く拒んでいた。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tus recuerdos están hechos mil pedazos que tu mente se niega piadosamente a reorganizar, impidiéndote recordar los escandalosos acontecimientos de la velada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your memories have been split into tiny fragments that your mind mercifully refuses to reassemble into a clear picture of the scandalous events of last night.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus recuerdos están hechos mil pedazos que tu mente se niega piadosamente a reorganizar, impidiéndote recordar los escandalosos acontecimientos de la velada.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Par chance, vos souvenirs sont fragmentés en séquences si courtes que votre esprit refuse de les rassembler pour vous donner une image claire des événements scandaleux qui ont émaillé la nuit passée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your memories have been split into tiny fragments that your mind mercifully refuses to reassemble into a clear picture of the scandalous events of last night.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Par chance, vos souvenirs sont fragmentés en séquences si courtes que votre esprit refuse de les rassembler pour vous donner une image claire des événements scandaleux qui ont émaillé la nuit passée.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Deine Erinnerungen sind in winzige Bruchstücke zerfallen und dein Verstand weigert sich gnädigerweise, ein klares Bild der skandalösen Ereignisse letzter Nacht zu zeichnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your memories have been split into tiny fragments that your mind mercifully refuses to reassemble into a clear picture of the scandalous events of last night.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Erinnerungen sind in winzige Bruchstücke zerfallen und dein Verstand weigert sich gnädigerweise, ein klares Bild der skandalösen Ereignisse letzter Nacht zu zeichnen.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Hatıraların, küçük parçacıklara bölünmüş durumda. Zihnin, merhamet göstererek bu parçaları birleştirmeyi ve dün geceki skandal olayların net bir resmini çizmeyi reddediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your memories have been split into tiny fragments that your mind mercifully refuses to reassemble into a clear picture of the scandalous events of last night.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hatıraların küçük parçacıklara bölünmüş durumda ve zihnin merhamet göstererek, bu parçaları birleştirmeyi ve dün geceki skandal olayların net bir resmini çizmeyi reddediyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
